pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 25, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 25, 2016:

Ottawa

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Notes for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:30 p.m.


Montreal

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour Ubisoft.

5455 Avenue de Gasp√©
(10th floor)
Montreal, QC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 3 p.m. for accreditation


PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
